subject: Basketball
Documentary Films and Programs
World War II (1939-45)
Japanese-Americans
lead_paragraph: Wat Misaka, a Japanese-American who became the first nonwhite player in the N.B.A. in 1947, is part of basketball history but also part of American history.
snippet: Wat Misaka, a Japanese-American who became the first nonwhite player in the N.B.A. in 1947, is part of basketball history but also part of American history.
